sentences.en: A chemical compound containing two bromine atoms bound to another element or radical.
sentences.cn: 叠氮原子团和一种元素或一种基结合形成的一种化合物.

sentences.en: A new method for determining the bromine content in brominated polystyrene was studied.
sentences.cn: 提出了测定溴化聚苯乙烯中溴含量的方法.

sentences.en: Beryllium, bismuth, and bromine must be considered as well.
sentences.cn: 少量的还包括还有铍 、 铋 、 溴.

sentences.en: Bromine can restrain central nervous system and avoid insomnia.
sentences.cn: 溴:抑制中枢神经,有镇静作用,能防治失眠.

sentences.en: Bromobenzene, magnesium , antimony trichloride and bromine act as raw materials, dibromotriphenylantimony flame retardant is synthesized.
sentences.cn: 以溴苯、镁粉 、 三氯化锑、溴素为原料, 合成了二溴三苯基锑阻燃剂.

sentences.en: Derivatives of bromine are much more active than the corresponding one of chlorine.
sentences.cn: 溴的衍生物的活性要比相应的氯的衍生物大得多.

sentences.en: Exposure to fumes from strong acids, ammonia, some organic solvents, chlorine, hydrogen sulfide, sulfur dioxide, and bromine can also cause irritative bronchitis.
sentences.cn: 强酸，氨，有机溶液，氯，硫化氢，二氧化硫和溴也能引起刺激性支气管炎。

sentences.en: In this way a bromine 'handle' for adding extra resveratrol units can be placed in one position or in two positions in a controlled manner.
sentences.cn: 通过这种方法，一个用于结合其他白藜芦醇单元的溴“把手”就可以可控地放置在一个或两个位置。

sentences.en: Magnesium mine, salt mine , Bromine mine, Piezoelectric Crystal.
sentences.cn: 镁矿, 盐矿,溴矿, 压电水晶, 铸石用玄武岩.

sentences.en: Main product has bromine of chloride, industry, magnesium chloride to wait.
sentences.cn: 主要产品有氯化钾 、 工业溴 、 氯化镁等.

sentences.en: Objective To observe the efficacy of bromine - containing disinfectant in on - the - spot disinfection of swimming pool water.
sentences.cn: 目的观察含溴消毒剂对游泳池水现场消毒效果.

sentences.en: Supported by the favorable bromine pricing environment, we are confident that this is an optimal opportunity to leverage our strong balance sheet and invest in Gulf Resources.
sentences.cn: 由于溴盐定价环境令人满意，我们相信此举将是海湾资源公司增加资本，进行投资的最佳时机。

sentences.en: Synthesis of 2 - bromothiophene using thiophene and bromine and glacial acetic acid as solvent was studied.
sentences.cn: 以冰乙酸为溶剂,通过噻吩和溴反应制备了 2- 溴噻吩,并探讨了诸因素对产率的影响.

sentences.en: Test standard samples of bromine number 0.
The existing bromine in acetic acid could aggravate corrosion on metal hole.
sentences.cn: 醋酸中含溴会加剧金属孔蚀.

sentences.en: The number of cationic bromine and chlorine compounds is restricted.
sentences.cn: 溴、氯阳离子化合物的数量受局限.

sentences.en: The preparation and catalytic properties of different bromine - free catalysts were discussed.
sentences.cn: 溴蒽类催化剂的活性较低,相应的研究也较少.

sentences.en: The yield was higher using bromine The yield was higher using bromine than chlorine.
sentences.cn: 用溴比用氯时产出率高.

trans.tran_en: a pungent dark red volatile liquid element of the halogen series that occurs in natural brine and is used in the production of chemicals, esp ethylene dibromide
